It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 45 #ifdef PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC 46 class point_iterator_; 47 49 class point_const_iterator_ 50 { 51 public: 53 typedef trivial_iterator_tag iterator_category; 54 56 typedef trivial_iterator_difference_type difference_type; 57 59 typedef value_type_ value_type; 60 62 typedef pointer_ pointer; 63 65 typedef const_pointer_ const_pointer; 66 68 typedef reference_ reference; 69 71 typedef const_reference_ const_reference; 72 73 inline 74 point_const_iterator_(const_pointer p_value) : m_p_value(p_value) 75 { } 76 78 inline 79 point_const_iterator_() : m_p_value(0) 80 { } 81 83 inline 84 point_const_iterator_(const point_const_iterator_& other) 85 : m_p_value(other.m_p_value) 86 { } 87 89 inline 90 point_const_iterator_(const point_iterator_& other) 91 : m_p_value(other.m_p_value) 92 { } 93 95 const_pointer 96 operator->() const 97 { 98 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(m_p_value != 0); 99 return m_p_value; 100 } 101 103 const_reference 104 operator*() const 105 { 106 _GLIBCXX_DEBUG_ASSERT(m_p_value != 0); 107 return *m_p_value; 108 } 109 111 bool 112 operator==(const point_iterator_& other) const 113 { return m_p_value == other.m_p_value; } 114 116 bool 117 operator==(const point_const_iterator_& other) const 118 { return m_p_value == other.m_p_value; } 119 121 bool 122 operator!=(const point_iterator_& other) const 123 { return m_p_value != other.m_p_value; } 124 126 bool 127 operator!=(const point_const_iterator_& other) const 128 { return m_p_value != other.m_p_value; } 129 130 protected: 131 const_pointer m_p_value; 132 133 friend class point_iterator_; 134 135 friend class PB_DS_CLASS_C_DEC; 136 }; 137 #endif
